about_the_game:
This is the demo of Corrupted Spirits as you might imagine, what you might not expect is that you can play all the way through until after the first boss fight. This should give you as the player a good feel for the the main character, Cara, along with some of the other characters you meet along the way. Now some of those characters might be allies that join your party, other might be ones that just help you out while others might be ones that you might have to fight. It should also give you a chance to get a good handle on the controls and how they work.

Below is a Synopsis of the game's story along with a bit about some of the characters in the game. Mind you not all of the characters are listed here or on the website as that would defeat the purpose of playing the game.

Synopsis:
A young hunter named Cara is chosen by the Lumina, Spirit of Light to bring the spirits of the land back to normal, getting rid of any corruption they might have in their souls. Along the way she will meet a few friends and allies that might try to help her on her journey.

Characters:
Cara: A young hunter whom lives in the Forest of Light, making due by herself. That is until one day she sees a bright light. She chooses to seek it out, finding out that it is coming from the old Shrine of Light, she gets chosen by the Goddess of Light to rid the other spirits of their corruption.
